info.name: OPEEC - Complete API Collection
info.description:
Complete API collection for OPEEC Equipment Rental Platform.

Variables:
- {{url}} - Base server URL (e.g. http://localhost:5005)
- {{admin_token}} - Admin JWT token
- {{seller_token}} - Seller/Owner JWT token
- {{buyer_token}} - Buyer/Renter JWT token
- {{user_token}} - Common user JWT token

body.raw:
